title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: VR-Based English Oral Proficiency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational knowledge in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Achieve an evaluator-rated score of 3.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) for English oral presentation skills using science-specific terminology from over 80% of learners
Improve natural English conversational fluency (speech rate, response latency) by 40% in VR simulation environments
Achieve over 70% grammatical accuracy when performing tasks that involve explaining science experiment procedures in English

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
